item.description:
Hey incubators! Let's have a blast of fun this week. We'll be back in Democracy plus some big announcements too. Take a gander at the calendar and all info about the The Boston Improv Comedy Marathon that I am producing this weekend and that features several of your organizers, plus current and past incubators.

We'll rock out some fun relaxing stuff this week and get into the funny!

Come on come on get yourselves out there Thursday then come out for part of the fun over the weekend!

Any improvised questions? Let me know!

Cheers!

Jason J.
item.name: We're going to the distance, we're going for speed....
